title: File Download Manifest
description: Root object keyed by file names (no directories) with metadata for download entries.

^[^/\\\\]+\\.[^/\\\\]+$.description: Metadata for a downloadable file entry keyed by its filename (no slashes).

thumbnail.description: Optional relative path to a thumbnail image.

dateAdded.description: ISO-8601 date the entry was added (YYYY-MM-DD).

dateModified.description: ISO-8601 date the entry was last modified (YYYY-MM-DD).
